name: Fishing King :The Urban Angler
description:
◆◆◆ A game that captures the true excitement of the struggle between man and fish! ◆◆◆

Cast, Land, and Compete!
Real live competition fishing! 'Fishing King!!'

▶ Embark on an urban angling adventure!
No more pointless waiting around for fish to bite! Work your way through the stages to the top!
Complete quest after quest to rise to the top, becoming a true master angler!

▶ The hottest fishing grounds all over the world at your fingertips!
Transport yourself to the world's richest fishing grounds wherever you are - at home, at work or in your car!
Endless sprawling seas and magnificent seascapes!

▶ The excitement of the hunt at your fingertips!
Easy one-handed play! Cast, hook and reel in!
Realistic and dynamic fishing battles!

▶ Why play alone when you can play with friends?
Multiple fishing tournaments are held each day. See how you measure against players from around the world!
Catch the most fish or the largest! Keep tabs on your opponents' progress in real time as you compete!

▶ Who's the best angler around?
Engage new rivals daily in exciting fishing battles!
Tirelessly work your reel to seize victory! Prove yourself a true fishing master!

▶ Keep your favorite prize fish in your Aquarium.
Fill your Aquarium with your favorite and most memorable catches!
The fish you keep in your Aquarium might bring you unexpected gifts from time to time!
